Kmeans¶

Kmeans model under POM2.

class MMLL.models.POM2.Kmeans.Kmeans.Kmeans_Master(comms, logger, verbose=False, NC=None, Nmaxiter=None, tolerance=None)¶

Bases: MMLL.models.POM2.CommonML.POM2_CommonML.POM2_CommonML_Master

This class implements Kmeans, run at Master node. It inherits from POM2_CommonML_Master.

Create a Kmeans_Master instance.

Parameters

  • comms (Comms_master) – Object providing communication functionalities.

  • logger (mylogging.Logger) – Logging object instance.

  • verbose (boolean) – Indicates whether to print messages on screen nor not.

  • NC (int) – Number of clusters.

  • Nmaxiter (int) – Maximum number of iterations.

  • tolerance (float) – Minimum tolerance for continuing training.

ProcessReceivedPacket_Master_(packet, sender)¶

Process the received packet at master.

Parameters

  • packet (dictionary) – Packet received from a worker.

  • sender (string) – Identification of the sender.

TakeAction_Master()¶

Function to take actions according to the state.

Parameters

None –

Update_State_Master()¶

Function to control the state of the execution.

Parameters

None –

check_empty_clusters(array)¶

Function to check if there are empty clusters in array.

Parameters

array (numpy array) – Array with centroids.

Returns

flag – Flag indicating whether there are empty clusters.

Return type

boolean

class MMLL.models.POM2.Kmeans.Kmeans.Kmeans_Worker(master_address, comms, logger, verbose=False, Xtr_b=None)¶

Bases: MMLL.models.POM2.CommonML.POM2_CommonML.POM2_CommonML_Worker

Class implementing Kmeans, run at Worker node. It inherits from POM2_CommonML_Worker.

Create a Kmeans_Worker instance.

Parameters

  • master_address (string) – Identifier of the master instance.

  • comms (Comms_worker) – Object providing communication functionalities.

  • logger (mylogging.Logger) – Logging object instance.

  • verbose (boolean) – Indicates whether to print messages on screen nor not.

  • Xtr_b (ndarray) – Array containing the inputs for training.

ProcessReceivedPacket_Worker(packet)¶

Process the received packet at worker.

Parameters

packet (dictionary) – Packet received from the master.

naive_sharding(ds, k)¶

Create cluster centroids using deterministic naive sharding algorithm.

Parameters

  • ds (numpy array) – The dataset to be used for centroid initialization.

  • k (int) – The desired number of clusters for which centroids are required.

Returns

centroids – Collection of k centroids as a numpy array.

Return type

numpy array

class MMLL.models.POM2.Kmeans.Kmeans.Kmeans_model(logger)¶

Bases: MMLL.models.Common_to_models.Common_to_models

This class contains the Kmeans model.

Create a Kmeans_model instance.

Parameters

logger (mylogging.Logger) – Logging object instance.

predict(X_b)¶

Uses the Kmeans model to predict new outputs given the inputs.

Parameters

X_b (ndarray) – Array containing the input patterns.

Returns

preds – Array containing the predictions.

Return type

ndarray
